Original.Name: Air Kerenzikov With Only Air Dash Perks-17892-1-0-1731887211.zip

State.Author: v1ld
State.Description: The Air Kerenzikov perk can be bought once Aerial Combat is bought, it no longer requires the Gundancer perk. This allows using Air Kerenzikov with pistols, tech weapons, smart guns, precision weapons and sniper rifles without having to buy a large number of AR/SMG-only perks.  The Dash/Air Dash perk tree is still required to unlock the perk.
State.Name: Air Kerenizikov With Only Air Dash Perks - No AR and SMG Perks Needed

State.Author: yamashi
State.Description: Scripting framework for modders and quality of life fixes.
State.Name: Cyber Engine Tweaks

State.Author: svarmod
State.Description: This mod suggest a set of useful changes for inventory menu, display items, tooltips and other UI features. It's fully customizable.
State.Name: Inventory Adjustments Hub

State.Author: v1ld
State.Description: Sorts Ripperdoc inventory so it's much easier to see what they have for sale. Settings menu allows sorting by name or quality, ascending or descending. Especially useful with mods that add new cyberware or make lower tiers of cyberware available all the time.
State.Name: Sort Ripperdoc Inventory

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new feline companion, Elmo, to the Japantown apartment. Includes 12+ different spots for her to use, as well as the option to pet her the same way as in the Pet The Cat mod.
State.Name: Apartment Cats - Japantown

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Functionality unlocks for all Berserk: no longer restricts the player to only melee weapons and/or retains unspent charge level on deactivation and/or prevents VFX stacking.
State.Name: Berserk Unchained

State.Author: Phoenicia
State.Description: Adds 12 new cyberware to the game.
State.Name: Black Chrome - Cyberware Expansion

State.Author: The guy posting it
State.Description: Fix for bolt shot resetting issues.
State.Name: Bolt Shot FX Reset Fix

Original.Name: Cleaner Main Menu and Pause Menu-10285-2-3-1752876182.zip

State.Author: heero139
State.Description: Reduces height of menu buttons to make room for additional menu entries, removes the Phantom Liberty banner if not installed, and hides some of the background elements to make the menu background more visible.
State.Name: Cleaner Main Menu and Pause Menu

State.Author: destinybu
State.Description: DLC Liberation Protocol brings Twitch & GOG exclusives like Gwynbleidd, Scorch, Yasha, and Black Unicorn to your fingertips. Immerse yourself with these and many other DLC items, seamlessly integrated into the world. Discover them across four unique locations and two specialized clothing vendors.
State.Name: DLC Liberation Protocol

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Extends default crafting capabilities allowing you to choose clothes and weapons skins, plus weapons damage type and name while crafting.
State.Name: Enhanced Craft

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: 16 new iconic weapons throughout NC. New appearances, new visual effects, never-seen-before original gameplay effects and weapon types.
State.Name: Extra Iconics

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Control crosshair opacity. Conditional options to make it show more clearly when needed.
State.Name: Fading Crosshairs

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Improves the behaviour of Judy, Panam, River, and Kerry when they are "busy"/suspended. They will no longer just go idle at their home location, but will instead be gone, leaving a note for V.
State.Name: Gone Away - Better Partner Suspended Behaviour

Original.Name: Really Want To Stay At Your House - Panam-8775-3-3-0-1740793534.zip

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Panam will now stay at V's H10 apartment sometimes, if V romanced her. Includes all the Panam Romanced Enhanced Features of schedules, hug and kiss options.
State.Name: I Really Want To Stay At Your House - Panam

State.Author: Jack Humbert
State.Description: This plugin looks for all r6/input/*.xml files and merges them with the appropriate input config file from r6/config/ and saves results to r6/cache/. A configuration file is written to engine/config/platform/pc/input_loader.ini, which tells the game to load the merged .xml files.
State.Name: Input Loader

State.Author: Paleforce
State.Description: Tired of pulling out your rocket arm just to watch your rocket fly past an enemy and hit a wall? Worry no more! Make the Projectile Launcher System finally make sense.
State.Name: Intuitive Projectile Launcher System

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
NEW ICONIC PROJECTILE LAUNCHER: mess with the implants of your enemies with this thunderous projectile launcher. 

Sure to wreak havoc on electronics and leave your opponents at your mercy.
State.Name: Jarngreipr (Lightning Projectile Launcher)

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Loot icons focused on expandedness and customization
State.Name: Loot Icons Extension

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Finds the shortest route between two selected metro stations and helps you navigate with ease.
State.Name: Metro Pocket Guide

State.Author: BuffMcMuff
State.Description: Adds a custom non-replacer fully functional smart LMG to the game.
State.Name: Midnight Arms MA70 BSG Smart LMG

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Adds three new Mox-themed iconic weapons, each with custom appearance, effects, and world implementation.
State.Name: Mox Cache - New Iconic Weapons

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots for the Westbrook district. Partner drinks at Lele Park, Xiao Xiongmao, and Dark Matter; plus solo drink spots
State.Name: NCI Addon - Westbrook

State.Author: Phoenicia
State.Description: Enhance your neural system with 40+ new implants, unlock devastating techniques, and manage a new neural capacity resource that adds depth to your cyberware choices
State.Name: Neuralware - Chipware Expansion

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Disables camera auto centering while driving in TPP or FPP mode.
State.Name: No Camera Auto Centering

State.Author: destinybu and buffmcmuff
State.Description: It's not just a silencer; it's a cry for help. Congratulations, your gun is now as subtle as your self-doubt. Comes in 4 Variants. BIG.
State.Name: Overcompensator

State.Author: Boe6
State.Description: Adds Playable Blackjack! Gamble your Eddies and become a millionaire after hitting 21!
State.Name: Playable Blackjack - Gambling System

State.Author: The guy posting it
State.Description: Cost reduction, text and perk interaction fixes.
State.Name: Quickhack Fixes

State.Author: RMK
State.Description:
Lets you set up to 5 Quickhack loadouts for your Cyberdeck with an easy to use interface in the cyberdeck equip menu. Give each loadout a custom name; save and load loadouts at any time.



Optional file lets you equip loadouts with hotkeys at any time during gameplay.
State.Name: Quickhack Loadouts

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Retrothrusters are tolerable now.
State.Name: Retrothrusters QoL

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Adds a new iconic variant of the Satara, including new appearance, new iconic ability, new visual effects, and custom implementation into the world.
State.Name: Ronin - New Iconic Weapon

State.Author: apart
State.Description: Adds set bonuses to the TTRPG-sets, Silverhand's gear and some other pseudo equipment sets. This mod also makes those items iconic, so they cannot be accidentally sold or dismantled.
State.Name: Set Bonuses

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Restores a functionality removed from the game in v2.1: 

Sonic Shock prevents further quickhacks (on the affected target) from starting the Position Reveal trace.
State.Name: Sonic Shock Prevents Trace (restored)

State.Author: RMK
State.Description:
Tracks and rewards Ghost, Pacifist, No-Touch, and more objectives for almost every quest and gig. Adds an all-new stealth-focused perk tree to unlock new abilities such as Pickpocketing. Unlock new items including new variations of Optical Camo. Inspired by games like Deus Ex and Dishonored.



Updated for patch 2.1!
State.Name: Stealthrunner - Stealth Gameplay Expansion

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Slowed (easier to read) activity log messages
State.Name: Throttled Activity Log

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Adds three new Tyger Claws-themed iconic weapons, each with custom appearance, effects, and world implementation.
State.Name: Tyger Cache - New Iconic Weapons

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: Archive extension loader
State.Name: ArchiveXL

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Three new cyberwares for the hands slot. 

One for Power weapons, one for Smart weapons, and one for Tech weapons. 

One bundle to rule them all, to find them, to bring them all and in the Nexus bind them.
State.Name: Extra Hands (cyberware)

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to use vanilla timeskip widget in a more immersive way.
State.Name: Immersive Timeskip

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Hides main HUD widgets by default and shows them only on certain events (configurable). Adds in-game widget toggle hotkeys and a bunch of optional files to tweak different HUD elements.
State.Name: Limited HUD

State.Author: sosuinepsixuyu
State.Description: Read the description.
State.Name: Melee Attacks Fixes And Enhancements

State.Author: Phoenicia
State.Description: Adds 15 drugs to the game, along with toxicity effect, and cyberware, for handling toxicity.
State.Name: SynthDose - More Drugs

State.Author: Metool
State.Description: Recon Grenades are bugged, such that, if bounced against the ground, enemies will be attracted to location of the bounce instead of the final location after bouncing. This mod fixes that bug.
State.Name: Bug Fix - Recon Grenade Bouce Fix

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Restores Malorian 3516's hybrid functionality: ricocheting hipfire and piercing aimed shots.
State.Name: Borg Malorian Restored

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Make the Breach minigame more challenging by having the timer start immediately and shortening the timer length. Completely configurable in-game! (Previously released as part of Level Scaling & Balance)
State.Name: Challenging Breach Minigame

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod allows other mods to easily add settings menus using only native UI, thus looking like the games settings menu
State.Name: Native Settings UI

State.Author: Boe6
State.Description: Adds playable roulette tables to the world. Gamble your hard-earned Eddies and try your luck!
State.Name: Gambling System - Roulette

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Congratulations, Valued Customer. Budget Arms™ has stocked a new product.
State.Name: Slaught-O-Matic Platinum

State.Author: Cosmin G
State.Description: Annoyed by NPCs? This mod enhances NPC behavior, allowing pedestrians to react to your vehicle's horn. Honk your horn while on the pavement to make the pedestrians dodge out of the way, or honk when off the pavement to make them run or walk away (customizable to your liking).
State.Name: React To Horn - Get out of my way NPC

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Set multipliers to damage for NPCs and/or the player - configurable in game
State.Name: Damage Scaling (Formerly Level Scaling and Balance)

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod adds the smart window similar to the one in the 2018 E3 Demo, with interactive features and stock market integration.
State.Name: E3 Smart Windows

State.Author: Boe6
State.Description: Little mod to add a Button to Gamble at any Pachinko Machines!
State.Name: Pachinko Button - Gambling System

Original.Name: Native Settings UI Side Menu Add-on 1.3.8-16218-1-3-8-1746264362.zip

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: This QoL mod adds a side menu with a list of mods for easier navigation.
State.Name: Native Settings UI Side Menu Add-on

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: This mod lets you play different mini-games on the physical arcade machines
State.Name: Playable Arcade Machines

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Allows settings to be saved even if all keybinds are not set, reversing a weird feature/bug introduced in patch 2.1.
State.Name: Allow Unbound Actions (Keybinds)

State.Author: Paradox4624
State.Description: When melee attacking from stealth, this mod suppresses auto uncrouching, for the initial stealth attack and additional melee attacks for 3 seconds after entering combat. If the first attack kills outright, the player should remain in stealth. Otherwise, with some quick follow-up attacks, the player may be able to end combat and re-enter stealth.
State.Name: No uncrouching when melee attacking from stealth

State.Author: ByteBlitzer
State.Description: Force player to stand instead of crouch if sprint button is pressed during sliding animation, when using crouch sprinting perk.
State.Name: Stand After Sliding

State.Author: dragonshardz
State.Description: Chrome Compressor OS now actually does what it says on the tin - compresses cyberware allocation by up to 30%.
State.Name: Actual Chrome Compression

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Functionality unlocks for all Berserk: no longer restricts the player to only melee weapons and/or retains unspent charge level on deactivation and/or prevents VFX stacking.
State.Name: Berserk Unchained

State.Author: Phoenicia
State.Description: Restores Bounties, for non-boss enemies
State.Name: Bounties Restored

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: A small mod that shows you what attribute level you needed for conversation skill checks that you pass (normally the game just shows your current attribute level).
State.Name: Clear Skill Checks

State.Author: BuffMcMuff
State.Description: Adds a custom non-replacer fully functional smart revolver to the game.
State.Name: DR-10 Wormhole Smart Revolver

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Reduces iguana egg hatching period from 90 days to a few lower values of your choice.
State.Name: Faster Iguana Hatch

Original.Name: Really Want To Stay At Your House - River-8826-3-3-0-1740793600.zip

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: River will now stay at V's H10, Glen, Japantown, or Corpo Plaza apartments sometimes, if V romanced him. Includes all the River Romanced Enhanced Features of schedules, hug and kiss options.
State.Name: I Really Want To Stay At Your House - River

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Adds three new NCPD-themed iconic weapons, each with custom appearance, effects, and world implementation.
State.Name: NCPD Cache - New Iconic Weapons

State.Author: Baarn
State.Description: Prevents the Crash Reporter from opening after a crash.
State.Name: No Crash Reporter

State.Author: BuffMcMuff
State.Description: Adds a new fully functional smart precision rifle.
State.Name: Rostovic Koplje Smart Precision Rifle

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Pondered redo of the Trace Position mechanic. Random shmucks won't be equipped to trace your scifi magic, but encountering experts of the field will challenge you in new ways. 

Completely customizable.
State.Name: Trace Position Overhaul

Original.Name: Filter Saves by Lifepath and Type-3400-1-5-0-1735257975.zip

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Adds buttons in Save and Load menus to filter saves by Lifepath and type (manual/auto/quick/point of no return, etc.). Works with controller too!
State.Name: Filter Saves by Lifepath and Type

State.Author: Kvalyr
State.Description:
Melee Weapon finishers as stealth takedowns - 

Takedowns without grappling first (Initiate grapple OR takedown from stealth)
State.Name: Stealth Finishers (ZKV_Takedowns)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Reliable ricochets. Ballistic Coprocessor made competitive.
State.Name: Ricochet Redux

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new (holographic) feline companion, Leia, to the Corpo Plaza apartment. Includes 11 different spots for her to use, as well as the option to pet her the same way as in the Pet The Cat mod. Includes 3 holographic appearances as well as a non-holo normal cat one.
State.Name: Apartment Cats - Corpo Plaza

State.Author: sosuinepsixuyu
State.Description: Read the description
State.Name: Decals Flickering Fix

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Just adds category filters for your storage items list.
State.Name: Stash Filters

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new feline companion, Jack, to the Northside motel apartment. Includes 9 different spots for him to use, as well as the option to pet him the same way as in the Pet The Cat mod.
State.Name: Apartment Cats - Northside Motel

State.Author: rfuzzo
State.Description: A simple mod that adds netrunner-specific rewards (buffs) to the player if they hack an access point. Most encounters in the game have access points and as a netrunner it makes sense that they should give you buffs for the fight.
State.Name: Better Access Point Hacking Netrunner Rewards

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: Script extensions
State.Name: Codeware

State.Author: Tunnfisk
State.Description: Increases the speed of Divided We Stand homing projectiles.
State.Name: Divided Faster Projectiles

State.Author: psiberx and DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Powerful transmog system with 30+ clothing slots / Outfit manager
State.Name: Equipment-EX

State.Author: Metool
State.Description: Modifies Jenkins' Tendons to remove the unwritten, second condition of having your feet on the ground. Now it can recharge while airborne.
State.Name: Jenkins Tendons Cyberware Can Recharge While Airborne

State.Author: destinybu
State.Description:
Unveil the Midas Collection: 

Hand of Midas - an iconic gun that heals with precise headshots, or rebukes your miss

Midas Gaze - a scope that ensures weakened foes meet a dazzling demise

Golden Slumber - a silencer that rewards sharpshooting with ammo
State.Name: Midas Collection

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Disables the game intro videos.
State.Name: No Intro Videos

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Panam now Eats, Drinks, Sleeps and uses her phone around the Aldecaldos' camp, and showers, if you have romanced her. V can chat with and hug her at any of her activity spots, and her bed also now works more reliably. Updated for patch 1.6 and REDmod version available
State.Name: Panam Romanced Enhanced

State.Author: nobo
State.Description: Quickhacks are sorted by slot.
State.Name: Quickhacks sort by slot

State.Author: Spicy2332
State.Description: Makes changes to the quick hack screen - either cleans it up completely or just cleans up the default green
State.Name: Spicy Clean Hack Screen

State.Author: jack
State.Description: Does your modded setup have you dying in some asshole's memories of glory days? Modular options for incoming damage while playing as a non-V character, during scripted driving sequences, or in a vehicle.
State.Name: Flashback Fixer

Original.Name: No Paper Bags From Vending Machines-8387-1-2-1686061498.7z

State.Author: johnson
State.Description: You know that feeling when it's a hot summer day outside and you want to get yourself a cold beverage straight from a vending machine - so you insert the coin, choose your favourite flavour and wait in anticipation for that paper bag to come out? ye me neither dunno
State.Name: No Paper Bags From Vending Machines

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: Adds a night vision mode to Kiroshi optics implants
State.Name: Kiroshi Optics Night Vision Mod

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new feline companion, Suzi, to the Dogtown "apartment". Includes 12+ different spots for her to use, as well as the option to pet her the same way as in the Pet The Cat mod.
State.Name: Apartment Cats - Dogtown

Original.Name: Disable W-S Keys To Select Dialog Options-9799-1-0-0-1696830742.zip

State.Author: K4DAV3R
State.Description: Do not make any more mistakes when choosing a dialogue you did not want because you moved using the W or S keys.
State.Name: Disable W-S Keys To Select Dialogue Options

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Adds a search option for stash screen menu.
State.Name: Stash Search

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Fixes the armor tooltip in the Cyberware/Ripperdoc menu to be factually correct and show your actual current damage reduction from armor rather than a theoretical maximum.
State.Name: Better Armor Tooltip

State.Author: r457 and gh057
State.Description: Browser Extension Framework creates an easy entry point to add your custom Web Sites to the main browser page: “NETdir://ncity.pub”. It also gathers and shows all the vanilla sites defined as journal entries in the game’s resources.
State.Name: Browser Extension

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: Search codex / shards / quests / messages
State.Name: Find-EX

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Grappling an enemy with gorilla arms is typically inescapable.
State.Name: Gorilla Grapple

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a little immersion to all the bartenders you can buy drinks from, you can now actually have animated drinks at their bars
State.Name: Immersive Bartenders

State.Author: fishnipples129 or Dane
State.Description: This mod clips a voice line that can contradict Judy wanting to keep her name out of anything to do with the Heist. The male voice line and subtitle will be modded while the female voice line and subtitle will be vanilla.
State.Name: -Judy Identity Privacy- for Male V

State.Author: neburas
State.Description: Finally fixed NPC's Mizutani Shion horn blaring and missing engine sound
State.Name: Mizutani Shion horn fix

Original.Name: 3. Mute Menu Inventory and Scan Humming-18781-1-2-1741562532.zip

State.Author: Valour549
State.Description: This mod mutes the annoying humming in the menus. Additional option to mute the humming in the inventory and during scanning.
State.Name: Mute Menu Humming (with Inventory - Scan options)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Hacking any access point will now enforce a breach of devices and npcs around the location. Workaround for unlinked access points and buggy/incomplete squad networks.
State.Name: Radial Breach

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Fixes 8 distinct bugs with the status/buff/debuff bar and weapon wheel.
State.Name: Status Bar Bug Fixes

State.Author: psiberx
State.Description: TweakDB modifications loader and script extensions
State.Name: TweakXL

Original.Name: Show Player Health Bar When Scanning-19815-1-1-1741110173.zip

State.Author: Valour549
State.Description: Annoyed by enemies health bar sometimes showing and sometimes not? No longer!
State.Name: Better Enemy Health Bar Fix

State.Author: sosuinepsixuyu
State.Description: Brief overview(doesn't exist)
State.Name: Movement And Camera Tweaks

State.Author: DeepBlueFrog
State.Description: Sets items sliders to max by default for Drop, Stash and Sell actions.
State.Name: Adaptive Sliders

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new feline companion (Nali) to The Glen apartment. Includes 12 different spots for Nali to use, as well as the option to pet him the same way as in the Pet The Cat mod.
State.Name: Apartment Cats - The Glen

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a little immersion to the Dogtown bartenders you can buy drinks from, you can now actually have animated drinks at their bars
State.Name: Immersive Bartenders - Dogtown

State.Author: Spicy
State.Description: Makes the wardrobe open instantly by removing the pointless loading bar intro.
State.Name: Instant Wardrobe

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a few different states for Judy to be in when you visit her apartment once romanced; no longer stuck to her window. Includes the hug mod! Now with the option to kiss her
State.Name: Judy Romanced Enhanced

State.Author: destinybu
State.Description: Cyberpunk 2077's first ever Throwable Blunt Weapon - Mjölnir. 6 Iconic Abilities. 2 Variants. Supports 20 Languages. "Street Cred? Basic? Prototype tech from back in the 2020s? Now we talking.
State.Name: Mjolnir

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to tweak some interaction and loot markers visibility behavior.
State.Name: Muted Markers

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Adds three new Nomad-themed iconic weapons, each with custom appearance, effects, and world implementation.
State.Name: Nomad Cache - New Iconic Weapons

State.Author: CyanideX
State.Description: Removes scope glitches, scanlines, tint, and 3D HUD effects. Also tones down distortion and vignetting.
State.Name: Preem Scopes (Remove Tint Glitches Scanlines and 3D Depth Effect)

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Custom backpack screen with different sorting options, filtering and item preview.
State.Name: Revised Backpack

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Restored Comrade's Hammer's ability to headshot and to pierce through obstacles. 

Bullets will only explode against enemies
State.Name: Comrade's Hammer Restored

State.Author: jack
State.Description: Changes the hardcoded shooting patterns of enemies. Enemies now shoot at you immediately and no longer have a delay in firing. They can fire as fast as you can.
State.Name: No shooting delay

State.Author: keanuWheeze
State.Description: Adds configurable zoom levels to scoped weapons, that can be cycled through.
State.Name: Zoomable Scopes

State.Author: Valour549
State.Description: Annoyed by enemies health bar sometimes showing and sometimes not? No longer!
State.Name: Better Enemy Health Bar Fix

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Only modifies the turning radius of (all) vehicles to realistic amounts. They'll still have a lot of stats to differentiate their performances, but you can now expect everything to be able to turn a corner.
State.Name: All Vehicles Can Steer

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Half the options had limited usability. Reworked their implementation to make them more universally appealing options.
State.Name: Better Chimera Mods

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Scales up conversation skill checks so that you'll see options requiring higher attribute levels in general and as you level up. For those who want their attribute choices to both limit and reward. Configurable with in-game menu!
State.Name: Convo Skill Check Scaling

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds the option to dance with someone at club dance floors. Judy, Panam, River, Kerry, Jackie, Reed, Alex, Johnny, and So Mi are all potential choices
State.Name: Dance Off

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a little immersion to all the food vendors you can buy food from, you can now actually have animated snack when visiting them!
State.Name: Immersive Food Vendors

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Makes the Gun-O-Rama's shooting range a little more interesting with moving targets, which react to V shooting them. Adds a repeatable 60 second shooting timer, with tracked score. Also improves LODs in the range.
State.Name: Kabuki Gun Range Enhanced

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Know who or what you're looting.
State.Name: Looting QoL

State.Author: saltypigloaf
State.Description: Regina's Psycho Killer quest rewards restored
State.Name: Psycho Killer Reward - Restored

Original.Name: Ragdoll Physics Overhaul 2.0 BETA - Main File-3858-2-0-1705775258.zip

State.Author: SketchCritic
State.Description: Improves flexibility of limbs, resulting in a greater variety of final poses and more natural animation. Also fixes vanilla collision issues that caused some NPC models to bend one leg backward in an unnatural angle. Compatible with update 1.5 of Cyberpunk.
State.Name: Ragdoll Physics Overhaul

State.Author: MisterChedda
State.Description: Fixes the slight kickback/roll after exiting vehicle and the bike tilt/lean bug in 2.3
State.Name: Vehicle Exit Fix for 2.3

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: Close both a message and the messenger with a single keystroke.
State.Name: Game v2.0 patch - Quick Message Exit

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a Native Settings menu that can be used to change/enable/disable settings such as fewer/no chases, longer timers, no/easier damage objectives, faster/longer range hacking etc
State.Name: Courier Jobs - Feature Settings

Original.Name: Don't Hide Stamina Bar on Holster-9448-1-0-1696167242.zip

State.Author: RMK
State.Description:
The game hides the stamina bar when you holster your weapon using the holster key (not Alt) on KB/M, but then it stays hidden, even if you draw and fire a weapon, unless you draw it by pressing the holster button again.



This mod just disables the hiding, which is unnecessary because the bar hides when you reach 100% stamina anyway.
State.Name: Don't Hide Stamina Bar on Holster (Bug Fix)

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new quest to the game. Requirements: Romanced Judy, Judy stays in NC, had a positive conversation with Judy's Abuela
State.Name: New Quest - Hot Fuzz

State.Author: VeganForTheAnimals
State.Description: Instead of instantly revealing your position, hitting an enemy with a remoted controlled car or turret now starts a trace and only alerts enemies.
State.Name: Stealth Remote Control Cars and Turrets

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Alternative take on Berserk's resistance and invulnerability
State.Name: Alternative Berserk

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Tracks and reports NCPD and MaxTac kills and provides NCPD loot drops.
State.Name: Cop Killer

State.Author: destinybu
State.Description: Cyberpunk 2077's first ever Throwable Blunt Weapon - Mjölnir. 6 Iconic Abilities. 2 Variants. Supports 20 Languages. "Street Cred? Basic? Prototype tech from back in the 2020s? Now we talking.
State.Name: Mjolnir

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: All explosions (caused by the player) qualify for Pyromania application.
State.Name: Pyromania Unchained

State.Author: Scream81
State.Description: This mod fixes the odd behaviour of the Health bar when you have many RAM cells.
State.Name: RAM bar fix

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Framework for weapon mods, to enable specific weapons to swap firemodes at the press of a keybind while leaving all unaffected weapons untouched.
State.Name: Trigger Mode Control

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: A few minor tweaks to vehicle summon system: increased repair cost, decreased summon distances, paid vehicle calls and dismissing.
State.Name: Vehicle Summon Tweaks

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds animation support for non-canon romances in several scenes, particularly during The Sun ending. Allows Fem V to have Panam's romance scene. Adds an easy to use menu to enable non-canon romances in a save. Does not break scenes for the canon romances.
State.Name: Non-Canon Romances Enhanced

State.Author: WopsS
State.Description: A script extender for REDengine 4.
State.Name: RED4ext

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Adds a search option for stash screen menu.
State.Name: Stash Search

State.Author: Atticus
State.Description: Restore the eddies transfer notifications at drop points that were gone after 2.12a.
State.Name: Eddies Notification Fix

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: No more glitchy teleports across the map when forward dashing in combat.
State.Name: Dash Fix

State.Author: nremind
State.Description: Fixes animated ads
State.Name: Fix Advert Animations

State.Author: Atticus
State.Description: Re-enables the Open/Close HUD prompt for the H10 stash door that was removed in 2.0.
State.Name: H10 Interactive Stash Door Restored (2.3 Supported)

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a little immersion to the [2] Dogtown food vendors you can buy food from, you can now actually have animated snack when visiting them!
State.Name: Immersive Food Vendors - Dogtown

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Better control over when the ricochet preview is visible, or not, now with customizable options.
State.Name: Keep Drawing The Line (ricochet preview)

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new quest to the game. Requirements: Romanced Judy, Judy stays in NC, had a positive conversation with Judy's Abuela
State.Name: New Quest - Californication

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: V's car will now respawn in a designated parking spot close to each apartment when staying* there. Also works at Judy's apartment and Panam's camp
State.Name: Parking Spots Enhanced

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
More enemies learn how to upload quickhacks to the player. Customizable quantity and quality. 

Placement is randomized again every time you load a save. 

Like Amateur Hackers, but random.
State.Name: Random Netrunners

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Custom in-world vendor support via simple TweakDB/TweakXL records
State.Name: VendorsXL

Original.Name: No Crowd panic from stealth activity CET 1.0.0-7360-1-0-0--1675797226.zip

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: No more crowd panic caused by stealth grab takedowns or body pickups.
State.Name: Immersion patch - No crowd panic from stealth activity

State.Author: v1ld
State.Description: NCPD Scanner missions used to have separate icons for each mission type: Assaults, Suspected Crime Activity and Reported Crimes. This returns to that pre-2.0 behavior. Very useful since Reported Crimes have hidden stashes while Suspected Crimes often have special rewards like iconic weapons but they can't be seen among all the Assaults!
State.Name: Pre-2.0 NCPD Scanner Map Icons

State.Author: sosuinepsixuyu
State.Description: Read the description
State.Name: Enemies Dodging Fix

Original.Name: Base Fists and Arm Cyberware Attack Speed Fix-14130-2-12-2024-04-09-1712688991.zip

State.Author: Metool
State.Description: Arm Cyberware and Base Fists now scale with melee attack speed, and running low on stamina will slow your attack speed, just like other melee weapons.
State.Name: Bug Fix - Base Fists and Arm Cyberware Attack Speed Fix

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: 2 NEW BERSERK lines. Both give bonuses to both melee and ranged weapons.
State.Name: Extra Berserks (ranged capable)

State.Author: icxrus
State.Description: Fixes NPC vehicle dodge reactions. No more jumping in-front of your car!
State.Name: Fixed NPC Vehicle Reactions

State.Author: Azagorh
State.Description: Restore the pre 2.0 ironsight animation
State.Name: Malorian Arms 3516 Alternative Ironsight Animation

State.Author: Jack Humbert
State.Description: Adds a redscript-configurable "Mod Settings" page to the main menu that any mod can add a page to.
State.Name: Mod Settings

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a small new "romance" (hookup) with Rita Wheeler, the Mox bouncer.
State.Name: Rita Wheeler Romanced

State.Author: enowai
State.Description: Second Heart cyberware NPC reaction improvements.
State.Name: Second Heart Fix

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Stops combat from auto-triggering when you use a silenced gun or throwing knife. Lets you use those weapons from stealth even when you don't one-shot kill enemies.
State.Name: Silent Silencers and Throwing Knives

Original.Name: No Crowd panic from devices CET 1.2.0-7353-1-2-0-1676631159.zip

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: No more crowd panic form using computers, doors, access points, etc.
State.Name: Immersion patch - No crowd panic form using devices.

State.Author: mar
State.Description: Radio Port will not turn on after leaving a vehicle if it was already off.
State.Name: Radio Port Vehicle Fix

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Allows to select and activate quickhacks with keyboard number hotkeys.
State.Name: Quickhack Hotkeys

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: A few minor tweaks to vehicle summon system: increased repair cost, decreased summon distances, paid vehicle calls and dismissing.
State.Name: Vehicle Summon Tweaks

State.Author: The guy posting it
State.Description: Sorting in the backpack now takes into account the "+" stat of weapons.
State.Name: Better Quality Sort

State.Author: Metool
State.Description: Extends the Bolt buff duration from the Technical Ability Perk tree from 2s to 4s because the Senkoh LX Tech SMG expires half way through its magazine ( 30 magazine / 7.7 fire rate = 3.89s fire duration per charge).
State.Name: Senkoh LX Bolt Fix

State.Author: Tron-117
State.Description: Adds a new iconic variant of the Defender LMG. Charging up the weapon grants it explosive rounds!
State.Name: Cronos (New Iconic Weapon)

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Seems like he's doing much better now, want to find out how much better?
State.Name: Flaming Crotch Man Romanced

State.Author: The guy posting it
State.Description: Correct tooltip for hammer damage stats.
State.Name: Hammers are not bats (tooltip fix)

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a little immersion to the NC rippers such that you now sit in their chairs to get work done. Fingers can be paid as an apology and regain access to his services.
State.Name: Immersive Rippers

State.Author: Azagorh
State.Description: Restore the pre 2.0 ironsight animation
State.Name: Malorian Arms 3516 Alternative Ironsight Animation

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new quest to the game. Requirements: Romanced Panam
State.Name: New Quest - Encore

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Reduces the time taken to pass through the Dogtown vehicle checkpoints by roughly 66%
State.Name: QoL - Faster Checkpoints

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
The Ticking Time Bomb perk will only trigger its explosion if you are in combat at the end of its delay. 

No more explosions during stealthplay.
State.Name: Sensible Time Bomb

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description: This mod restores missing crucial clue audio playback in The Hunt quest
State.Name: Immersion patch - The Hunt quest missing audio restore

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds configurable settings, through Native Settings, to give the player control over how often Johnny spawns, and the ability to disable various dialogue lines
State.Name: The Passenger - Feature Settings

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Slaught-O-Matic firearms are tolerable now.
State.Name: Slaught-O-Matic QoL

State.Author: Valour549
State.Description: Fighting gangs is no longer a crime and police won't turn hostile as you shoot it out with the hooligans.
State.Name: Fighting Gangs Allowed - Reasonable Police

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description:
Adds an opportunity to "romance" Aurore, after the events at the Black Sapphire.

"Voulez-vous coucher avec moi?"
State.Name: Aurore Romanced (Lady Marmalade)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Properly stun enemies with the quickmelee attacks of ranged weapons. 

Open them to grabs and finishers
State.Name: Buttslinger Quickmelee

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Completely removes the cartoonish sound effect that usually happens when triggering the Deadeye Perk. 

Keep the bonuses, ditch the extra sound effects.
State.Name: Deadeye Sound Remover

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: It's back baby!
State.Name: Heat Converter

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Better control over when the ricochet preview is visible, or not, now with customizable options.
State.Name: Keep Drawing The Line (ricochet preview)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Separate firemodes on all variants. Fully automatic 3-shots bursts + powerful single shot with increased damage and armor penetration.
State.Name: Masamune and Nowaki Revamp

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: An attempt to fix aim assist mistargeting NPCs exiting vehicles
State.Name: Passenger Targeting Fix

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: River now Eats, Drinks, Sleeps and Worksout around Joss' family trailer; if you have romanced him he also Showers, and V can hug and kiss him at any of his activity spots. Updated for patch 2.0.
State.Name: River Romanced Enhanced

State.Author: Valour549
State.Description: Enable actions like aiming, blocking, charging, and scanning while on the move.
State.Name: Better Movement - QOL Jog and Sprint

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Displays the actual names for vendors world map icons instead of generic type labels.
State.Name: Real Vendor Names

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: A collection of various, non-subjective, bug fixes. Merges a number of old bug fix mods into one archive for compatibility. Includes some new and improved fixes.
State.Name: Deceptious Bug Fixes

State.Author: MisterChedda
State.Description: Dynamic location-based wanted star color themes (Badlands, Dogtown, Night City)
State.Name: Dynamic Wanted Stars

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Removes the strong vignette effect from the Cool perk Focus
State.Name: Focus Vignette Removal

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Johnny can now spawn in V's other apartments, with the option to have him play guitar similar to the iguana & cat event in H10
State.Name: Here's Johnny

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description:
Adds a few different states for Kerry to be in when you visit him. Adds options to listen to him play guitar. Adds the option to hug him, if you are in a relationship.

Updated for patch 1.6 and REDmod version available
State.Name: Kerry Interactions Enhanced

State.Author: Tron-117
State.Description: Adds a new iconic variant of the Achilles rifle. It's special effect allows it to fire in full auto when fully charged, and it has the chance to disable enemy cyberware with each shot!
State.Name: MaxTac Silencer (New Iconic Weapon)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Separate firemodes on all variants. Fully automatic 3-shots bursts + powerful single shot with increased damage and armor penetration.
State.Name: Masamune and Nowaki Revamp

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Gives you the ability to pet Nibbles in V's apartment!
State.Name: Pet Your Cat

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Improves the TV channels texture quality, reducing pixelation and artefacting
State.Name: QoL - Higher TV Quality

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Adds customizable options regarding how good, our powerful V, actually is at handling guns
State.Name: Weapon Handling Control

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Dex's Gun? V's Gun.
State.Name: Plan C

State.Author: anygoodname
State.Description:
Simple and easy instant quest untrack. 

Track back if needed. 

Main Quest re-tracking preventer.
State.Name: Untrack Quest Ultimate - No Main Quest re-tracking - No leftovers

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Adds custom quickslots/hotkeys to the bottom of the screen for consumables, grenades, and cyberware abilities. Fully configurable with in-game menu. Supports controllers and keyboard/mouse.
State.Name: Custom Quickslots for Consumables Grenades and Cyberware Abilities

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Fixes gamepad button HUD icon hold indicator misalignment
State.Name: Gamepad Button Hold Indicator Fix

State.Author: Deceptious - xBaebsae
State.Description: Adds variants for each of the Apartment Cats mods, fully individualised so each apartment cat can have a different look. 7 different looks available.
State.Name: Apartment Cats - Custom Cats

State.Author: OREZXX
State.Description: Removes the  useless Crouch vignette effect
State.Name: Crouch vignette effect remover

State.Author: Boe6
State.Description: Adds Gambling Props with AMM support. Playing Cards & Poker Chips.
State.Name: Gambling Props - Poker Chips and Playing Cards

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a little immersion to the Dogtown rippers such that you now sit in their chairs to get work done.
State.Name: Immersive Rippers - Dogtown

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Camo Skin that doesn't magically disappear held weapons. Deactivable Optical Camo that retains unspent charge.
State.Name: Optical Camo Realism and Utility

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Let's V control the Radio, Bedroom TV, Kitchen TV, and Bathroom TV in Judy's apartment
State.Name: QoL - Interactive Judy's Apartment Devices

State.Author: yakuzadeso
State.Description: Fixes overlapping mesh that made the side screen flicker uncontrollably. Fixes overlapping mesh that was slightly visible on the big scope screen when using FSR.
State.Name: Rasetsu screens bug fix

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a Mute/Unmute option along side the Off / Previous Channel / Next Channel options on TVs
State.Name: TV Mute Control

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Just removes world placed shards which you have already read.
State.Name: Hide Read Shards

State.Author: jac3km4
State.Description: Compiler for Cyberpunk2077 scripts
State.Name: redscript

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: 16 new iconic weapons throughout NC. New appearances, new visual effects, never-seen-before original gameplay effects and weapon types.
State.Name: Extra Iconics

State.Author: MisterChedda
State.Description: Make Samurai Rare Again - reduce Samurai NPC clothing, items, posters.
State.Name: Less Samurai

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: V can now ride the Pacifica roller coaster with Songbird, Judy, Panam, or Kerry. As well as adding Johnny back to the repeatable rides
State.Name: Roller Coaster Enhanced

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Functionality unlocks for all Berserk: no longer restricts the player to only melee weapons and/or retains unspent charge level on deactivation and/or prevents VFX stacking.
State.Name: Berserk Unchained

State.Author: sosuinepsixuyu
State.Description: Read the description.
State.Name: Car Dodge Stutter Fix

State.Author: EmreHQ
State.Description: Compatible any ad. Animated ads are static in specified regions, this mod allows the animation of the ads to be played in these regions as well. Also, you can see more animated ads in the game.
State.Name: Enable Advert Animations (Ads)

State.Author: The guy posting it
State.Description: Restore old functionality to overclock's hotkey.
State.Name: Hold to Overclock while scanning

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Adds Jackie's machete as a new iconic weapon - complete with custom appearance, effects, and world implementation.
State.Name: Jackie's Machete - New Iconic Weapon

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: NEW ICONIC LEGS: bringing the hover functionality back, plus iconic effect tailored to better unleash your inner viking.
State.Name: Megingjord (hover legs cyberware)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Array of possible changes to the behaviour of all Kyubi rifles: weapon type, firemode, ammo used, damage,...  

Mix and match how you like.
State.Name: Modular Kyubi Revamp

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots outside the main city districts. Partner drinks at both Nomad Camps, the Sunset Motel; plus solo drink spots in Batty's Hotel, and at the trailer park
State.Name: NCI Addon - Badlands and Pacifica

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a new quest to the game. Requirements: Attended Jackie's ofrenda
State.Name: New Quest - One More Light

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Camo Skin that doesn't magically disappear held weapons. Deactivable Optical Camo that retains unspent charge.
State.Name: Optical Camo Realism and Utility

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Simply replaces the 'Entropy' stencil text decal lettering with a less "Serif"y typeface.
State.Name: QoL - Stencil Text Enhanced

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Adds little check marks to the recipe icons in the crafting menu so that you can tell what you already own. Only weapon mods and quickhack recipes will have the labels. Very useful for telling which quickhacks you already have in your inventory.
State.Name: Crafting Recipe Owned Labels

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Allows replacing (and destroying) currently equipped weapon mods, but not unequipping them.
State.Name: Replace Weapon Mods

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Core/framework mod file that allows for multiple quest type mods to use a single hook
State.Name: Deceptious Quest Core

Original.Name: Really Want To Stay At Your House - Judy-8753-3-4-0-1740793310.zip

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Judy will now stay at V's H10, Glen, Japantown, or Corpo Plaza apartments sometimes, if V romanced her. Includes all the Judy Romanced Enhanced Features of schedules, hug and kiss options.
State.Name: I Really Want To Stay At Your House - Judy

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description:
Array of possible changes to the behaviour of all Kyubi rifles: weapon type, firemode, ammo used, damage,...  

Mix and match how you like.
State.Name: Modular Kyubi Revamp

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots outside the main city districts. Partner drinks at both Nomad Camps, the Sunset Motel; plus solo drink spots in Batty's Hotel, and at the trailer park
State.Name: NCI Addon - Badlands and Pacifica

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Expanded Overclock mechanic: can now be portioned, but if run completely out of charge then you're going to be overheated and start burning
State.Name: Overclock Overheat

State.Author: Atticus
State.Description: Continually updated mod fixing what CDPR didn't fix - Misty, basic Panam fixes, Spellbound, KOLD MIRAGE & more.
State.Name: Quest Trigger Fixes (2.2 Supported)

State.Author: Phoenicia
State.Description: Makes it possible, for moders to add items that increase/decrease Reflex and Cool skill checks in conversations.
State.Name: Reflex is Cool

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description:
A collection of quality-of-life updates and changes for the patch 2.1 Romance Hangouts Feature(s)

This is an ongoing/wip project, starting with repeatable cuddle actions
State.Name: Romance Hangouts Enhanced

State.Author: KickingWriter
State.Description: Fixes the appearance of the 8-Ball on the Glen Apartment Pool Table.
State.Name: Glen Apartment - Pool Table (8-Ball Fix)

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds some immersion when visiting your favourite Ripperdoc. V now actually uses the ripper's chair when getting chrome/appearance work done. Vik is animated for it.
State.Name: Immersive Vik

State.Author: SOSUINEPSIXUYU
State.Description:
Basically allows you to climb more objects. 

      ***Fully compatible with any mod***
State.Name: More Climbable Objects

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots around the City Center district. Partner drinks at 7th Hell, Empathy, Memorial Park Patio, the Port Cafe, and Downtown greenhouse spot. Plus 3 solo drinking spots
State.Name: NCI Addon - City Center

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Adds a number of bar drinking spots to the game where V can grab a drink, maybe even share one... v0.5.x is limited to Watson, Westbrook, and Heywood locations. Also adds some vista/locations from Edgerunners where V can sit/relax. Future updates will add more districts, more actions (eating), and *maybe* more characters.
State.Name: Night City Interactions - Watson Westbrook and Heywood Drinks plus Edgerunners locales

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Replaces Unity placeholder with your actual weapon in some cutscenes.
State.Name: Cutscene Weapon Swapper

Original.Name: Delete -A Few Weeks Tops- Voiceline UNTESTED-16932-1-0-1728722317.zip

State.Author: fishnipples129 or Dane
State.Description: After the heist, Vik will say that that you only have a few weeks to live. What this mod does is clip that voiceline so that the "a few weeks tops" part of it is gone.
State.Name: Delete -A Few Weeks Tops- Vik Voiceline

State.Author: Misoru
State.Description: Valentinos have a unique machete so why isn't it GOLD?
State.Name: Gold Machetes for Valentinos

Original.Name: Really Want To Stay At Your House - Kerry-8806-3-3-0-1740793481.zip

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Kerry will now stay at V's H10, Glen, Japantown, or Corpo Plaza apartments sometimes, if V romanced him. Includes all the Kerry Interactions Enhanced features of schedules, hug and kiss options, and guitar song requests
State.Name: I Really Want To Stay At Your House - Kerry

State.Author: v1ld
State.Description: Replaces the "NCPD Scanner" Custom Map Filter with 3 new entries, one each for Assault In Progress, Suspected Organized Criminal Activity and Reported Crime. The latter 2 have bigger missions and better rewards, so now you can always have them on your map while Assaults are still available for when you want some combat missions.
State.Name: Improved NCPD Map Filters

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots for the Heywood district. Partner drinks at Pinche Polo, Dicky Twister, Chubby Buffalo's, and El Coyote Cojo
State.Name: NCI Addon - Heywood

Original.Name: Plan C - Japantown Stash Wall Fix-13461-swf-1-0-1735425568.zip

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Dex's Gun? V's Gun.
State.Name: Plan C

State.Author: Metool
State.Description: Makes the Technical Ability Perk: "Renaissance Punk" scale with Attribute level instead of only giving a 4 Cyberware Capacity bonus at level 9. Now level 4 Attributes give 2 Cyberware Capacity, level 15 attributes give 6 Cyberware Capacity, and level 20 Attributes give 8 Cyberware Capacity.
State.Name: Renaissance Punk - Perk Scaling

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Use the bodies of the fallen as shields against your enemies
State.Name: Body Shield

Original.Name: Disappearing NPC and Vehicle Fix (Ultra Light)-19628-1-0-1740932760.zip

State.Author: Valour549
State.Description: Fixes NPCs and vehicles often vanishing into thin air. High compatibility and minimal impact on performance.
State.Name: Disappearing NPC and Vehicle Fix (Crowd LOD spawn distance)

State.Author: Seijax
State.Description: Control crosshair opacity. Conditional options to make it show more clearly when needed.
State.Name: Fading Crosshairs

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots around the Santo Domingo district. Partner drinks at the Buryger Diner, Red Dirt, Kenmore Diner, the Market (NW of Megabuilding H4), PieZ, and Captian Caliente
State.Name: NCI Addon - Santo Domingo

State.Author: The guy posting it
State.Description: Locking crosshair properly accelerates animation when an enemy has a debuff effect for faster lock. Recon grenades actually work.
State.Name: Smart Gun Lock Speed Fixes

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Makes Wilson's gun range (2nd Amendment) usable outside of his competition side quest. Includes 60s countdown and target hit counting/score.
State.Name: Wilson's Range

State.Author: Vanilladoesntreal
State.Description: Changes the scanner's time dilation strength based on your Intelligence attribute. Using the named ranks that gatekeep perk unlocks, like Pro (level 9) or Phenom (level 15) as breakpoints.
State.Name: Intelligence based scanner time dilation

State.Author: DJ_Kovrik
State.Description: Enables auto disassembling on pick up  for clothes, weapons, mods, grenades and healers depending on item quality (configurable)
State.Name: Smarter Scrapper

State.Author: Defyant
State.Description: Just a clean wallpaper for the in-game computers.
State.Name: Clean Computer Wallpaper

State.Author: Demon9ne
State.Description: Your most flagrant murders are finally acknowledged.
State.Name: In Cold Blood - NPC Execution Fix

State.Author: Deceptious
State.Description: Addon for Night City Interactions with drinking spots for the Watson district. Partner drinks at Tom's Diner, Lizzies, and Afterlife; plus solo drink spots
State.Name: NCI Addon - Watson

Original.Name: Not as much Faster Vehicle Knockback Animation-5431-1-0-1664298083.7z

State.Author: JohnsonsStuff
State.Description: Makes V get up faster after being hit by a car.
State.Name: Faster Vehicle Knockback Animation

State.Author: RMK
State.Description: Configurable multipliers for all XP types, including level, street cred, crafting, stealth, all weapon XP types, engineering, etc.
State.Name: Simple XP Multiplier
